data.title: Choices of Living
data.meta_description: assisted living, assisted living community, senior community, senior assistance community Ada, OK--Durant, OK--Moore, OK
data.text:
Featherstone Assisted Living brings together people with common life experiences and provides a wide variety of opportunities to build new relationships. Educational sessions, entertainment, chapel and Bible services, and speakers on a variety of subjects are brought to our front door. The purposefully designed community areas put you just steps from the services you need and the friendly company you want. Apartments with kitchen areas and private baths are provided. Multiple service plans are available for meals, housekeeping, laundry, activities and transportation. At Featherstone Assisted Living, maintaining good health is a part of enjoying life.

Good things come to those who don't wait! While patience is a virtue, sometimes waiting for just the right moment means you just might get passed by. The same thing is true for planning your retirement lifestyle. Your happiness, health and peace of mind is important. Call today to become a part of our family!

LIVING CHOICES

Featherstone Assisted Living offers the choice of one bedroom, two bedroom or studio apartments with private bathrooms. All apartments have kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves and some have patios. Featherstone Assisted Living provides specially trained staff twenty-four hours a day to offer caring and competent support to residents. Scheduled transportation to and from doctor, dental, lab appointments, and shopping is offered.

CONVENIENCE

Featherstone Assisted Living offers a homelike environment. Residents have easy access to dining areas, a beauty shop, activity room and an exercise area, all without having to leave the building.

SECURITY

Featherstone Assisted Living features a single story residential design. The building is protected by smoke detectors and a sprinkler system. Each apartment has an emergency call system and individual locking doors.

TAILORED SERVICES

At Featherstone Assisted Living, we are dedicated to promoting each resident's independence, dignity, and right to personal choices. We recognize that each person has needs and preferences for care and lifestyle. With this in mind, we offer each resident choices in flexible service combinations and apartment styles. The affordable monthly fee is a combination of these two components.

LIFE ENRICHMENT
